thread.title: Oregon State Parks partially lifts campfire ban in time for Labor Day weekend
thread.title_full: Oregon State Parks partially lifts campfire ban in time for Labor Day weekend

author: senh
title: Oregon State Parks partially lifts campfire ban in time for Labor Day weekend
text: BING NEWS: Oregon State Parks partially lifts campfire ban in time for Labor Day weekend With lower temperatures, moisture and a gradual relaxation of fire bans by other jurisdictions, the statewide Oregon State Park fire ban has been cancelled. Campfires are allowed again in designated metal fire pits in the Columbia River Gorge, Willamette ... 09/4/2015 - 7:08 am | View Website FOX 7 Austin 09/3/2015 - 8:45 pm | View Website Portland, Oregon Portland is the largest city in the U.S. state of Oregon and the seat of Multnomah County, located near the confluence of the Willamette and Columbia rivers. 09/3/2015 - 7:26 pm | View Website U.S. News | National News ABC News reports on United States politics, crime, education, legal stories, celebrities, weather, the economy and more 09/3/2015 - 1:00 pm | View Website Oregon City News
